title: Step 27

challengeFiles.name: main

tests.text: You should have an else clause to move the disks in the opposite direction.
You should have print(f'Moving disk {rods[target][-1]} from {target} to {source}') inside your else clause.
You should remove the last element from rods[target].

description: When forward is False, the disk has to be moved in the opposite direction. Write an else clause for that. Print the move and change the content of the lists accordingly.
